content:
Brejinho
Brejinho (Little Swamp) is a city  in the state of Pernambuco, Brazil. The population in 2009, according with IBGE was 7.369[1]  and the area is 106.3 km².

Economy
The main economic activity in Brejinho is agribusiness, especially the breeding of cattle, goats, sheep, pigs, chickens;  and planting of corn and beans.
